  • What We Do

    We provide the consultancy services for company, seeking, listing through our ServeBank Financial ,Inc.
    We handle the entire listing process from start to finish so that the co. owners can focus on the business.

What Companies

Why Us

We reduce the time & and cost of your listing

We have our own team from the accountants, auditors, attorneys, market makers etc. Listing period is between 8 months to 12 months depending on the documents available.

We provide a safe and affordable option

We finance up to 80% of your listing fees in lieu of shares of your listed company. If your company is not listed, we do not own any of your current company, simple and safe. We make things simpler and affordable!

We handle the entire listing process from start to finish, so you can focus on your business

You do not need to deal with so many different parties.
